content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

Introduction

  • Thank you for taking the time to review our privacy policy. At Ytx Solutions, we’d like to ensure that your personal information is always safe and secure. We collect certain information about our customers and site visitors, including both identifiable personal information and non-identifiable information. Identifiable personal data is collected when you sign up for our services or use our website for transactions or subscriptions. Non-identifiable information is gathered automatically when you visit our website or those websites hosted by us and stored to be used in our system.
  • This privacy policy explains what information we collect, why we collect it, and how we use it. In most cases, we collect this information to ensure network integrity and that we continue to provide you with the most relevant content and the best possible service that suits your needs. In some cases, we are required by law to collect personal information about customers. Except where the law requires otherwise, we undertake to protect the confidentiality of such data.

Confidentiality

  • Brandemic respects your privacy. We protect the confidentiality of our customers and users, including all personal information supplied in the course of contracting with us for services. We do not sell your personal information to third parties for commercial or marketing purposes.

Collection of Personal Data

  • Brandemic gathers information about you when you visit websites we host; apply for a service subscription; respond to a customer questionnaire; and through the use of cookies. We may also combine information about you that we have with information we obtain from our business partners or affiliates.. You have the option to disable the cookie function in your browser, but will be restricted from accessing many sites as a result.

Use of Personal Data

  • Brandemic may occasionally contact you to tell you about services or products we think might interest you. You can opt out of receiving these types of communications at any time. Contact our customer services representatives at 9591953787
  • Brandemic will share aggregated user data with business partners, sponsors, or other third parties to develop content and ensure relevant advertising. This information will never be used to identify individual users. These business partners and affiliated companies do not have any independent right to share this information.
  • Brandemic may log the websites you visit and collect IP addresses and information about your operating system and the type of browser you use for administrative purposes. This data however will not be used to identify individual users who will at all times remain anonymous.
  • Any information you give us through correspondence is kept confidential, and will only be used to address your concerns. If this requires referring such correspondence within Ytx Solutions or to a third party to ensure customer service, your personal information will only be disclosed to the point necessary to address your query or concerns, and will otherwise be kept confidential.

Public Space (Bulletin Boards, Chat Rooms, and Third-Party Sites)

  • Please be aware that anything you say in a public space, including on any bulletin board, chat room or any site Ytx Solutions may host for you, can be read by anyone else who visits that space. Ytx Solutions cannot guarantee your privacy when you use such services.

Site Linking

  • Brandemic’s website contains many links to sites that belong to third parties unrelated to us. We cannot be held responsible for any use of your personal information arising from you disclosing personal such information on third-party sites, and we recommend that you review the privacy policy statements of those sites you visit.

Minors

  • Brandemic will not enter into a service subscription contract with minors unless such a person has explicit written consent from a parent or guardian to do so. Ytx Solutions undertakes not to contact minors about promotional offers or for marketing purposes without parental consent.

Reservation of Rights

  • Brandemic reserves the right to disclose information about our customers when it is necessary to do so in good faith, when required by law, or to defend ourselves against legal claims.
  • Brandemic will share information with law enforcement to investigate or prevent illegal activities from being committed over our network.
  • Brandemic reserves our rights to disclose your personal information where you have given us explicit legal written consent to do so.
  • Brandemic has the right to monitor user and network traffic for site security purposes. We may also take precautions to prevent any unauthorized attempts to tamper with our site or cause damage to our property.
  • Brandemic may update this privacy policy or make changes to its contents. When a substantial change is made, we will inform you by email or through a notice on our website. Customers and site visitors bear the responsibility to ensure that they have read the changes or updates as the case may be.
